```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(fs) # file syastem
library(vroom)
library(here)

source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
```

## Importing all user info data
```{r}
user_info_files <- dir_ls(
  here("data-raw/mmash/"),
  regexp = "user_info.csv",
  recurse = TRUE
)

user_info_data_frame <- map(
  user_info_files,
  import_user_info
) %>%
  list_rbind(names_to = "file_path_id") #

user_info_data_frame
```
